bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Hi,
could please consider an addition of librdkafka into EPEL7 repository? If you would need any help with packaging just let me know.

Sure, we use pykafka python package that for a better performance requires librdkafka in our cluster based on el7. In the current state, we are building librdkafka manually which is not an optimal solution.
If you approve my co-maintainer request, I will take care of EPEL branch.
This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 26 development cycle. Changing version to '26'.
librdkafka-0.9.4-1.el7 has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 7. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2017-671ee01fc5
librdkafka-0.9.4-1.fc26 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 26. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-ea111b0657
librdkafka-0.9.4-1.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-747a1d8dbd

librdkafka-0.9.4-1.fc26 has been pushed to the Fedora 26 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-ea111b0657

librdkafka-0.9.4-1.el7 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 7 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2017-671ee01fc5

librdkafka-0.9.4-1.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-747a1d8dbd
librdkafka-0.9.4-1.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
librdkafka-0.9.4-1.el7 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 7 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
librdkafka-0.9.4-1.fc26 has been pushed to the Fedora 26 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
